name: Catch the Bouncing Ball
overview: In this game you have to well, catch a little white bouncing ball. You control a tire or donut shaped sprite. The goal is to catch the ball directly in the center of the player sprite by pressing the fire button. You cannot move while the fire button is pressed down. This game was developed by Tobias Gohlke (also known as Toggle) for the Commodore 64 Crap Game Compo 2006 (C64CGC).
